name: ts-kraken
description: A versatile unofficial ts-lib & node-repl-cli to operate against the Kraken Crypto Exchange
author: JQ

scripts.build: npm run lint && rimraf dist && tsc -p .
scripts.zsh:bump:deps: deps=$(jq '.dependencies|keys|join(" ")' package.json | tr -d '"'); npm uninstall $(echo $deps); npm i $(echo $deps);
scripts.zsh:bump:devDeps: devDeps=$(jq '.devDependencies|keys|join(" ")' package.json | tr -d '"'); npm uninstall $(echo $devDeps); npm i --save-dev $(echo $devDeps);
scripts.zsh:bump:all: npm run zsh:bump:devDeps && npm run zsh:bump:deps
